a.title: Shrek Tickets On Sale NOW!
a.div:
Tickets for this event may be purchased online here: https://www.showtix4u.com/event-details/38019
Please make sure you are using Chrome, Safari or Firefox as your browser. Internet Explorer and Edge are not compatible.
If you experience difficulty purchasing online or would like to schedule a call to speak with a representative or order by phone, you can do so here: https://calendly.com/showtix4u/tickets
To purchase tickets, when on the event listing page, from the calendar, click on the time under the date you wish to attend to open and view the seating chart. Click on any available (green) seat to add it to your cart for purchase. Once all tickets have been added to your cart, click Checkout to proceed with the order. Select your Shipping Method, then hit Checkout. Manually fill in all required fields (email, first name, last name) then enter your credit card information in the field provided, including cc number, expiration, security code, and the billing zip code. Do not let any fields autofill, or they may not be recognized as being completed by your browser. You should then see the Pay With Card button is highlighted to submit your order.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
